content.text: Hey there! I'm a go-getter and always looking for ways to challenge myself. I work at a vet and prefer not to have pets since my home is my sanctuary and I need it to be a quiet place. I am a fixture on a weekly telenovela and stay active.

Hey! I'm retired school teacher. My family was the first to accept me for who I am, with my curly hair and snake. I like to bike and am allergic to apples yet still eat them. I own a mansion that I do not live in.
What do you like about being retired?
I love having time to pursue my hobbies, such as biking and reading. I also love spending time with my family.
That sounds great! I love that you have a lot of time for your hobbies. I wish I had more time to relax and enjoy my free time.
It's definitely a blessing. I'm glad I could share my thoughts with you.
It was nice chatting with you! I hope you have a great day.
